name: Oportuno Beyond Infinity Pills Game HD
name_original: Oportuno Beyond Infinity Pills Game HD
description:
"One Tap, Up Upwards Dodging Adventure!"

#Upwards is a brand new supra arcade avoidance game with a twist.
Most likely the next #1 appstore hit. :)

It's the next game you will be addicted of!
So how far can you go up? #upwards

Features:

• Amazing One-Touch Gameplay With Pills
• Procedurally Generated Fun Levels
• Modern and Minimalistic Art
• Pleasent Soundtrack
• Beat Friends, Family, and Team Mates in Game Center Leaderboards!

How to Play:

Tap anywhere on the screen to begin your upwards ascension.

Avoid the pink objects in a timely manner and get as far as you can!
